title: Scarface

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Beat someone up. They will be so damaged they cannot use any abilities tonight, the next day (or vote/speak), and the next night.
- Beat someone up. They'll be so scared that they run back to their home, essentially roleblocking them.
- Beat someone up. They die.

desc:
Post 3685
*And finally, 12 time champion, constantly on the brink of death, it's Scarface!*
*...*
